resources.string: Impact Assessment of Agriculture Information and Communication Centers\' Communication Sources in Agriculture
Section F: Framework Condition and Others
Could you please provide me information about your family size?
If Yes, What is the total cultivable land?
Do you own or rent for this land?
How much land do you have with year round irrigation?
What are the sources of information for the adoption of technology?
Of those different sources of information, what source provided the most useful advice?
Why was the source most useful?
Do you have working radio at your home?
Do you listen agricultural program in radio last month?
How often do you listen to the Radio Nepal/FM?
Do you know timing of broadcasting the agricultural program in radio Nepal?(6:40-6:55PM)
Which program(s) do you listen in radio Nepal?
Which topics did you used to listen or which information was received from listening agricultural program in radio?
Have your ever discuss the materials presented through agricultural program in Radio with other family member?
How can you rate hte quality of services compared to old services through radio?
Are you satisfied with the content of broadcasting materials the agricultural program in radio?
Do you adopt any new technology through listening agricultural program in Radio?
Is the agricultural program through radio relevant in disseminating agricultural extension service/technology?
Do you often listen agricultural program in radio from regional broadcasting and in FM
Is the spoken language clear in agricultural program in regional broadcasting and FM radio?
Is the time of broadcasting the agricultural program appropriate and convenient for you?
If not, which time do you prefer the most?
Why don\'t you listen agricultural program in radio?
Do you think, is it necessary to revise the agricultural program from Radio?
What can be done to improve the accessibility/regularity of agricultural program in Radio?
Do you have working TV at you home?
How often do you listen to the NTV?
Which program do you mostly watch in NTV?
Do you often listen agricultural program in Tv
Do you know timing of broadcasting the agricultural program in NTV?
Which program(s) do you listen in Nepal?
Which topics did you use to watch or which information was received from watching the agricultural program in NTV?
Have your ever discuss the materials presented through agricultural program in NTV with other family members?
How can you rate the quality of services compared to old services through TV?
Are you satisfied with the content of broadcasting materials with the agricultural program in NTV?
Do you adopt any new technology through agriculture program in NTV?
Is the agricultural program through TV relevant in disseminating agricultural extension service/technology?
Do you think the experience fo listening/watching TV make you try more new technology for agricultural production?
Do you often listen agricultural program in from regional NTV broadcasting?
Is the spoken language clear in agricultural program in regional NTV broadcasting?
Is the timing of broadcasting the agricultural program appropriate and convenient for you?
Which time do you prefer the most?
Is the duration of broadcasting sufficient for you?
If No, how much time is suitable for broadcasting the agricultural program in NTV? (in Minutes)
Why don\'t you watch agricultural program in TV?
Do you think, is it necessary to revise the agricultural program from NTV?
What can be done to improve the accessibility/regularity of agricultural program in TV?
Have you ever received any publication from AICC at your home?
Have you ever read booklet, leaflet, bi-monthly magazine published materials?
Could you please rate the extent of reading in these printed Materials?
From where you could receive these materials?
Which printed materials do you mostly read?
How often do you read these materials?
Which topics did you use to watch or which information was received from these printed materials?
Have your ever discuss the materials presented through agricultural program in printed materials with other family members?
How can you rate the quality of services compared to old services through these magazines?
Are you satisfied with the content of broadcasting materials the agricultural news in these printed materials?
Do you adopt any new technology through reading printed materials?
Is this agricultural program relevant in disseminating agricultural extension service/technology?
Do you think the experience of 1 listening make you try more new technology for agricultural production?
Do you often read agricultural program in form region or district level?
Is the language or content of these materials appropriate and convenient for you?
Which language odo you prefer the most?
Is the time of publication suit for you?
Why don\'t you read agricultural program in printed materials?
Do you think, is it necessary to revise the agricultural program from the materials?
What can be done to improve the accessibility?regularity of these materials?
Do you attend education meetings on agricultural extension services related issues in last year>
In general, when you have a question about farming, who are you most likely to ask?
Who takes decision on agricultural activities at your home?
At last, do you like to give any suggestion/comments on?
Access to agric. credit and loan
Other Materials, occasional newsletters, annual reports
Are you sure you want to clear?
Are you sure you want to delete?
